name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 12
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Combining Value Converters with i18n in Aurelia
posts.description: Today, I'd like to introduce you to Peter Vermeulen, an Aurelia community member with some great thoughts on Aurelia Value Converters and i18n. Peter, take it away....

posts.name: Early March Mega Release!
posts.description: Wow! We've got an incredible set of Aurelia releases for you! Today we're pleased to announce the 1.0 release of Aurelia Validation, the Release Candidate of our new Webpack plugin and major updates to the Aurelia CLI.

posts.name: Hope Through Hollis
posts.description: As a community of developers, we often get to share the joy of each other's successes. However, sometimes, people close to us experience great pain or loss as well. In those times, it's all the more important to help support and lift each other up. Below, I've invited Aurelia Core Team member, Shannon Horn, and his family to tell us about their Hollis, a vibrant young man, whose time was too short with us.

posts.name: Community Tools: FrontEnd Creator
posts.description: The Aurelia community continues to create great technology and today I'd like to introduce you to another such innovation. Matt Duffield, a long time Durandal and Aurelia developer, has been building something he calls "FrontEnd Creator". Read on to hear from Matt about his new tool.

posts.name: Announcing "Learning Aurelia" from Packt Publishing
posts.description: I'm very pleased to announce that Packt has published Learning Aurelia [https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/learning-aurelia] by long-time Aurelia community member Manuel Guilbault [http://manuelguilbault.com]. In conjunction with the book release, Manuel put together a short excerpt from the book, which I'm sure the whole community will enjoy. Read on to learn more about Aurelia from Manuel and don't forget to pick up your copy today [https://www.packtpub.com/web-development/learning-aurelia].

posts.name: Case Study: Nordic Cinema Group
posts.description: Today, I'd like to introduce you to Tomas Billborn, from Nordic Cinema Group, to tell you a little bit about their experience with Aurelia.

posts.name: New Aurelia Features and Release Notes - 1/12/2017
posts.description: This week's releases contain the usual bug fixes as well as a few performance enhancements. Additionally, a couple of new features have landed.
